summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons email chain regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein's status. The initial email on July 30, 2019, states Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs a cellmate. A follow-up email on August 13-14, 2019, shows a distribution list of 71 BOP staff recipients, indicating internal notification about his status change shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate (#76318-054) who is the subject of the email; being taken off Psych Observation and needs a cellmate.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An email states inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

events.title: Internal BOP Notification Distribution
events.description: A follow-up email with a distribution list of 71 Bureau of Prisons staff recipients is sent regarding the update on Epstein's status.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was taken off Psych Observation in BOP custody.
The email directive states Epstein needed to be housed with 'an appropriate cellmate' following his removal from observation.
A wide internal BOP notification (71 recipients) was sent regarding this status change on August 13-14, 2019.
The document is dated just weeks before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The email chain shows standard BOP operational communication regarding a high-profile inmate's housing status.
